data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Maga Buryatdan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Maga Buryatdan, Russia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Maga Buryatdan with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 10 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Maga Buryatdan, Russia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Maga Buryatdan to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Maga Buryatdan, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, 0.3% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Please, teach the 2,298 believers in Maga Buryatdan, Russia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Maga Buryatdan, Russia to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Maga Buryatdan, Russia has a population of 157,000.

We estimate Maga Buryatdan has 2,298 people who might know Jesus, 88,121 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 66,581 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,298 believers in Maga Buryatdan to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.
